overview.en: ISTAR CHAIN is a platform based on blockchain technology to create a pan-entertainment IP matrix. Users can participate in the creation of IP concepts using the system token ISTAR on the Xīng kōng, participating in the film IPToken investment and trading. The DAPP developed with blockchain technology has open, transparent and traceable features to ensure the transparency and security of the film investment process.Users can also send gifts to their favorite stars by consuming ISTAR, please TA for a lunch, watching movies, etc. Xīng kōng has created a shared and win-win film and television production and investment ecosystem, and created a full-industry chain platform for online incubation and offline resources matching.
overview.zh: 星空（ISTAR CHAIN）是一个基于区块链技术，打造泛娱乐 IP 矩阵的平台。用户在星空上可以使用系统代币ISTAR参与 IP 概念的创作，参与影视 IPToken 投资与交易。利用区块链技术开发的DAPP 具有公开透明、可追溯的特性，保证了影视投资过程的透明性与安全性。用户还可以通过消耗星空币，给自己喜欢的明星送礼物，请TA吃午餐、看电影等。星空打造了一个共享共赢的影视制作、投资生态系统，打造了一个线上孵化 + 线下资源匹配的影视全产业链平台。
